website_summaries.verdict: A good pick if you're looking for an effective, inexpensive vitamin C suppliment that comes in an easy-to-swallow tablet.
pros: Vitamins are made without artificial colors or flavors
Tablets contain 500 milligrams of vitamin C each, and are fairly easy for most to swallow
cons: Some customers gripe about bottles containing broken, powdery pills upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Small pills easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: If you hate taking horse pills then this is for you. These are small round pills that are easy to swallow. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Have use Nature's Bounty Vitamins for years and never have had a problem, these are no different. I put easy to swallow but that depends on you. These are 500mg each, so be aware of that. They are no problem for me in fact as these ran low I ordered the Nature's Bounty 1000mg Vitamin C and don't have a problem with them either. Wish I could tell you how effective they are but like all OTC Vitamins Who Knows! I do know that I trust the Nature Bounty Brand.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I needed a vitamin C that did not contain ingredients that are not recommended for people with histamine intolerance. These were perfect. I know that some people have said they are too big to swallow, but I have not found that to be the case. If they find that, they should just purchase themselves a pill cutter. The quality here is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Vuicich-Mallis

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite brand of Vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different supplements, and I really enjoy this one. I like the smaller dose (500 mg instead of the usual 1,000 mg I see everywhere), and the pills are super easy to swallow and I think have a nice taste. As to how effective it is, it seems to work well and give me a boost; but I think this stuff is always hard to really tell with supplements because the effect could only be mental, or placebo.
customer_reviews.author: J Dubster

customer_reviews.title: Great for women problems!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies......This product is great for our PHbalance down there if u know what I mean. It cures yeast and bacteria vaginosis bacteria!! Best natural cure there is!!!! Insert with a tampon and bad bacteria gone for good!!! I use it once a week!
customer_reviews.author: Eriqa

customer_reviews.title: Horse pills
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about how good these are as far as a nutrient. Probably comparable to most other vitamin C tablets. I have been taking 2 500 mg vitamin C tablets dailey for a couple of years and have found that by doing so, I am not as susceptible to being sick during the winter as I have in the past. My only problem with these particular pills is that they are way too big and problematic to swallow. The Nature Made brand, which I have been using is much easier to get down even without water.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C without any of the normal fillers. Be ...
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin C without any of the normal fillers. Be aware, this tastes extremely sour. The tablets are chewable, but for this reason, I would NEVER advise chewing unless it was for a bet.
customer_reviews.author: AutoExec

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wells but can be harder to swallow
customer_reviews.text: This is a round tablet. It's not coated so it dissolves easily , but it may be harder for some people to swallow. It's important to take vitamin C in smaller doses so you absorb it. Taking 1000 mg at once means most of it will go right through you. I take this one twice a day to help with my skin, nails (it helps produce collagen) and my immune system. According to consumerLabs, there are studies that suggest it might provide future protection from Alzheimer's, strokes, heart (atrial fibrillation), and improve blood pressure. Nature's Bounty was one of their top picks for Vitamin C higher dose. Taking extra vitamin C is especially important for anyone who smokes.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Counts

customer_reviews.title: A Bitter Pill to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are so difficult to swallow! There is no coating and even though they are no exceptionally large, they get stuck in my throat. They also scratch my throat. I have seen my life flash before my eyes on several occasions while taking these vitamins. I take fish oil twice as large with no problem. I will be searching for a new vitamin c supplement - I am tired of the abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J Dormer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE FOR GOOD VITAMINS
customer_reviews.text: I buy all my Nature’s Bounty vitamins from Amazon where I always get the best value. These are easy to swallow & have that slight tart Vitamin C flavor. I try not to taste my vitamins & swallow them down quickly. These are easy to swallow. I hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Welp
customer_reviews.text: So I thought these were chewable... they aren’t... so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Samoya Li

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C is great for inmune system, this is a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking vitamin c since before the pandemic started (I used to get sick a lot for no reason) and since December I have never gotten sick yet, which is record breaking for me, I've tried different brands of vitamin C and this one has the best value, been taking them for about over 1 month and so far still feeling good and haven't gotten sick. I do not take them daily tho, every time I go out I take them, and if I'm in the house for 4 days I take them 1 of those days, so far this method had worked wonderful for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth P

customer_reviews.title: Good size (for me). Dissolve a bit fast though.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm satisfied with this purchase. These are a good size for me. I had to return a couple other vitamin C pills because they were too large for me to swallow comfortably. These are about the shape and thickness of an aspirin but larger (about a half inch diameter). However, they do not seem to have a coating so I swallow them pretty quickly with water or they will start dissolving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Since the virus Vit C has been wiped off the shelves of every store I've been in. However this is a vit I have always taken. I was very glad to see I was able to purchase it thru Amazon. People are just getting nuts over this virus. I think I'll start a rumor that vitamin Z 15 helps your health, just to watch the redicules response, still no paper products available. Folks follow guidelines, stay well
customer_reviews.author: pat vicario

customer_reviews.title: Makes my esophagus burn
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking a different 500 mg vitamin C brand every morning, not with meals, for a long time with no problems. But I switched brands recently and every time I took these Nature's Bounty tablets it was like I was having heartburn (which I almost never experience). So I quit after only a few days and switched back to my old Walgreen's brand and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hempe

customer_reviews.title: Round tablets/easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Arrived new & promptly. Round tablets Easy to swallow Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Bargain hunter

customer_reviews.title: They melt in a humid room
customer_reviews.text: Every week I put my vitamins in a monthly case, Monday Tuesday Wednesday etc. this summer it’s been so hot and humid that the vitamin C pills are dissolved and stuck to the other pills. I’m hoping I solve the problem by putting the little cases in a plastic bag with some desiccant from another package. To be honest, I really don’t like these vitamin C‘s.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta-Eden

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. All this white ‘dust’ from ......... tabs maybe .... but I don’t trust it
customer_reviews.text: Quality Awful !! What is that white powdery substance Never buying unknown vitamins online ever again
customer_reviews.author: Candace Mike N Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Wowza!
customer_reviews.text: These are the sourest thing I have ever put in my mouth. I love lemons. That's what this tastes like, you just squeezed a lemon right in your mouth but times 5. Beware - That being said, they are small, maybe a little smaller than a dime, so they dissolve very quickly. Not sure how im going to get my 5-year-old to take these though
customer_reviews.author: ACASSIDY

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: So these are not so easy to swallow (I have to bite them) and don't really taste great. Money wise, it's a good deal. You'll get your vitamin C and be healthier for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pama

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to swallow.  Did not receive the same product I was expecting to reorder.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was reordering a vitamin c product we had been purchasing. This pill is large round rough and very difficult to swallow, not the same one we had previously been using. I didn't think Amazon would take it back after it was opened so my husband and I have been trying unsuccessfully to get used to it. Will not again purchase vitamin C with amazon because I don't know which one I will be receiving.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Seem normal like other brands
customer_reviews.text: Never bought this brand before. The bottle smells a bit off. But individuals smell fine and don’t really taste like much. So far I haven’t felt a change from the regular brand that I buy so if my regular is out of stock I’d probably buy these in the future again.
customer_reviews.author: Kbiggs

customer_reviews.title: They're excellent vitamin c
customer_reviews.text: I've had a cold for 3 weeks I think I'm getting over it but these vitamins really helped I can tell difference in just two days good vitamin c
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality supplement
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, less expensive than Walmart or Costco at the time of purchase (at least in our area—I always comparatively shop our subscriptions ahead of time), shipped on time, taste is not objectionable (taken only by adults who aren’t too picky). Overall a good quality supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Easier to swallow
customer_reviews.text: My last Vitamin C tablets were like sandpaper and hard to swallow. These are round and smooth and go right down.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Hugger

customer_reviews.title: Dry as cement
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible! Dry as cement and my daughter kept choking on them! “Returned”
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: A good brand at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good brand at a good price. How good of a vitamin is it? Idk I don't have a laboratory to check it. But the brand usually does well with independent tests. Easy to swallow, and no weird smell.
customer_reviews.author: ABAllen2010

customer_reviews.title: Seems OK but gets dirty quick
customer_reviews.text: This seems to have same nutritional value as other C vitamin brands. But I really disliked the texture. It's coated in heavy white dust. Not too bad a taste, but you get your fingers and clothes dirty easy when handling. Wish it was a cleaner tablet or pill
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: Hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These are not coated and are very difficult to swallow. Will not repurchase. We take several supplements and these are the only ones we cannot swallow. They are awful and we had to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri T

customer_reviews.title: These vitamin C pills keep me healthy
customer_reviews.text: I don't take them everyday, but on the days that i do i feel good. The citrus flavor of the pill is strong so i advise that you take it quick. I try to stay healthy and use natural products and i believe nature bounty keeps it safe.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if I will get this again but this is very tart.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned27

customer_reviews.title: Help you immune
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamins, doesn’t taste bitter nor bad. The pill is bigger than my biotin pill but not difficult to swallow. It is bigger than a bean, but not an issue to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Sick to stomach
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers here, this product made me very sick to the stomach and digestive system. I threw away the bottle because it made me feel so sick.
customer_reviews.author: Best I Can

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: It’s vitamin C. It’s not a chewable so the question about flavor is irrelevant. It didn’t leave a taste in my mouth because I swallowed it pretty fast LOL. Seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: GROSS.  Just, gross.
customer_reviews.text: These things taste absolutely nasty. I'm sure there is all the Vitamin C in them that has been promised, but definitely prefer other brands that actually taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this vitamin C supplement for quite a while now. I have had no problems taking them or digesting them. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: A decent vitamin from reputable company
customer_reviews.text: The expiration date was a little short considering how many pills are in the bottle. (You can only take so many a day...) But otherwise I was glad I could get these because I had been unable to find them in any brick and mortar store around me since spring of this year. I trust Nature’s Bounty. I buy several of their products and utilize subscribe and save for them also.
customer_reviews.author: HOTH

customer_reviews.title: 500 mg tablets
customer_reviews.text: These are round and not coated so they could be a little harder to swallow for an elderly person. These are not chewable, so the taste is n/a. I like Nature's Bounty products, so it's always a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great price. No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: It’s vitamin C. Stock up while you can. Great buy. Great quality and great price. No complaints. On my like 5th bottle from Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Jusburnin_dc5

customer_reviews.title: Quality Vitamin C - hard to swallow uncoated tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after CL Labs tested, verified and recommended the product. Unfortunately, the tablets are uncoated and hard for me to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: C.I.

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I've taken Vitamin C Zink and Vitamin D3 and I rarely get sick and when I do it doesn't last long until I'm feeling better again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the sweet orange flavor vitamin C from when I was a kid, I should have read more... its not the chewable yummy orange ones I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Abjenae

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I take extra vitamin C to keep my skin clear and to help with my immune system. I barely get sick since I started to take this vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: AppleFan

customer_reviews.title: Sour
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take but they are really sour! I this is the first time I used this brand. Others weren't as sour as these.
customer_reviews.author: CCM

customer_reviews.title: Boos Your Immunity
customer_reviews.text: These were a great value. Vitamin C, Vitamin D and Zinc have been in our daily routine for avoiding “the sickness.”
customer_reviews.author: BKPD

customer_reviews.title: Hard to swallow, tart taste, the same brand has capsule version for the same price per pill.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to swallow, tart taste, the same brand has capsule version for the same price per pill. I recommend the capsule version.
customer_reviews.author: Peri H Iz

customer_reviews.title: Just fine. I hope that it is doing what it is supposed to do. You can't tell with any of them.
customer_reviews.text: It is just fine. No problems. I don't know if it is doing what it is supposed to do inside your body; I hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt G Claude

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to multivitamin during cold and flu season
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow pill with no flavor on it or in it at all. Great addition to a multivitamin during cold and flu season.
customer_reviews.author: CS Coffing

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: They're vitamin C tablets. They don't taste great - but that's how I feel about most vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Lidpie

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good source.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow. Exceeds recom daily dose Comfort level is high for manufacturer's practices.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ricards

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A good Vitamin C product. Will buy from again. Good price for 250 tablets. Can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M Côté/GypsySoulSeed

customer_reviews.title: Very please
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to swallow but it’s very good for your immune notice a lot of changes finger nail growth
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: I can only assume this product is as good as any other brand.
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume this product is as good as any other brand. My doctor said it’s OK.
customer_reviews.author: ConeyIslandMN

customer_reviews.title: Easier to swallow, but a little more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has difficulty swallowing large pills or capsules, and this offered a solution. We take 1000mg per day, and she has a hard time not choking on a single pill of that dosage. Hence, the smaller portion in two pills. The only negative is that the cost is much higher than the 1000mg pill I purchase from Sam's. I take the larger dose, and she is content with her two pill solution.
customer_reviews.author: Robert in Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Bitter pills
customer_reviews.text: I choke every time I try to take one of these. I guess I need C capsules...
customer_reviews.author: Linus

customer_reviews.title: Health i guess
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take, no flavor, not sure if any benefits from it but i do it anyways
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Three stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cold and sickness(instead of consuming Orange fruit) but after consuming for couple of weeks didn't feel any difference and also didn't Harm.
customer_reviews.author: Bala prime

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your vitamin regiment
customer_reviews.text: Don't taste too good but great value for the money. Take them every day
customer_reviews.author: David Stockham

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Same great product you find in big box stores. No hassle fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: John Howell

customer_reviews.title: I really like
customer_reviews.text: I really like it is a very suitable product to raise the defenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amarilys D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described by the seller and arrived as scheduled.

customer_reviews.title: Good amount. Affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking vitamins C for almost 3 years now and this brand is my to go
customer_reviews.author: CGranada

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I’m taking them daily and they are great for swallowing
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking this vitamins for years and since the stores no longer carry them, had to purchase through amazon. These are not capsules so they dont taste like plastic when swallowing.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for your Money -- easy to swallow even for people bad at taking pills
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor, it helps ingesting, as I am bad with pills. This is objectively the best priced bottle ($/mg) on Amazon Prime right now.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty sour
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really the flavor of this pill is it really sour and not chewing

customer_reviews.title: Hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to grind each pill and put it in my yogurt or oatmeal. Pretty unhappy. The size of the pill is not so much the problem as the rough coating.

customer_reviews.title: Not time release
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not looking more carefully at what came up in the product search. These are NOT time release. They are wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin c
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vitamin C supplement that I could add to my routine to boost up my immunity during the pandemic. This one works great. It’s inexpensive and does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal and not clean
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when I got this item. Seal was broken, looked dirty inside and it was not what was described online

customer_reviews.title: Good product (doctor recommended)
customer_reviews.text: Excel product as recommended by my family doctor. Speedy speedy service. Will buy again from this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: Good value

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is awful but does what it needs to do

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Ever since COVID I started taking more of my vitamins. These are great.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't upset
customer_reviews.text: doesn’t upset my stomach and easy to swallow. its come from natural sources so probably close to natural sources of vitamin c.

customer_reviews.text: Do not chew! If you do be prepared for a mouthful of horror!! The vitamin has helped to boost my immunity but I have to swallow quickly so that it doesn’t dissolve in my mouth

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and quality! I was getting chewable ones, but they were expensive and eaten up fast. I like how long these last, and my eight year old doesn't mind swallowing them.

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my mood and energy during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: They do smell a little like hay, but they're pretty easy on the stomach. The smell could be a lot worse. There's not much aftertaste, which is nice.

customer_reviews.title: This supplement is doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a good supplement for the winter season to prevent the common cold.

customer_reviews.title: Great Immune boosters!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these capsules. I know my immune system is doing great because I have hpv, but it’s dormant right now thanks to these immune boosters! I was so happy to hear I was negative the last time I went to the obgyn!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Effective vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: This makes my immune system strong. SinceI got this vitamins I didn't get sick anymore. I love how easy it is to swallow and the taste is not bad.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use this product all the time and it’s always reliable.

customer_reviews.title: It seem to work OK
customer_reviews.text: I take every day which is really handy during winter months.

customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. Has helped my digestion a lot along with a few other changes.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed - supposedly helps with oral ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed - supposedly helps with oral surgery healing. I don't get enough by food so this is a great supplement. I even think this is vegetarian (no gelatin) Will last me as long as I will be needing it a good price too.

customer_reviews.title: Easy open lid and great value
customer_reviews.text: Besides the value, I love the flip top lid as I have arthritic hands

customer_reviews.title: Ummm Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Take at the first sign of sickness and also two a day for preventative measures. Soo good.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a vitamin. Hope it helps me live to be 125 yrs + .

customer_reviews.title: C-prize you are healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Never totally sure what vitamins are doing but I take Vitamin C as a matter of course. Will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Returned pills...Worn down and Powdery
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the product because the pills were all worn down and there was a thick layer of powder on the bottom of the bottle. Turns out, there was not enough cotton in the bottle to keep pills from moving and rubbing against one another. I’ll be buying another brand of vitamin C.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described. Quick shipping! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Maloy

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a bargain?
customer_reviews.text: Need to take this vitamin per Dr. Order. Great value andI trust the company.
customer_reviews.author: lee mahood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are lightly coated with a smooth covering, which makes them go down easily. Some other tablets are uncoated; they soak up moisture in your mouth, making them hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: George Towner

product_meta.title: Vitamin C by Nature’s Bounty for immune support. Vitamin C is a leading immune support vitamin, 500mg, 250 Tablets
product_meta.description: Size: 250 count. Vitamin C Tablets by Nature’s Bounty is one of our leading vitamins for immune support.* Vitamin C is an important nutrient for the functioning of white blood cells, which are vital components of the immune system.* Vitamin C Tablets from the trusted vitamin experts at Nature’s Bounty provide a sufficient dose of Vitamin C without the ingredients you may not want. They also are one of the best antioxidants for fighting free radicals.* Free radicals can cause oxidative stress that may lead to premature aging of the cells. Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Tablets combine science, nature and 50 years of expertise and innovation to provide the easiest way to increase your daily intake of this important nutrient for immune support and antioxidant health.* Nature’s Bounty is committed to safety and purity in all our supplements. Our Vitamin C Tablets are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners.
feature_bullets: Immune support: 250-count, 500mg Vitamin C Tablets for immune support. Vitamin C is one of the leading nutritional vitamins for immune support. People reach for Vitamin C by Nature’s Bounty to help them maintain a healthy immune system all year long.
Nourishes the immune system: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Tablets play an important role in the functioning of white blood cells, which are vital components of the immune system.

Potent antioxidant: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Tablets also support antioxidant health. Vitamin C is one of the best antioxidants for fighting the free radicals. Free radicals can cause oxidative stress that may lead to premature aging of the cells.

Purity is our priority: Nature’s Bounty is committed to safety and purity in all our supplements. Our Vitamin C Tablets are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners.

From the trusted wellness experts: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C supplements are a product of 50 years of dedication to quality, consistency and scientific research to make vitamins and nutritional supplements of unrivaled excellence.
